meanings.definition: Most round or spherical in shape.
meanings.sent1: The rotundest pumpkin won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The moon looked rotundest when it was full in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The rotundest snowman in the yard melted into a puddle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, round and rotundest.
meanings.sent5: The rotundest balloon floated gracefully above the crowd.

meanings.definition: Having the most rounded or plump figure.
meanings.sent1: Grandma baked the rotundest apple pie for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The rotundest cat in the shelter found a loving home.
meanings.sent3: The rotundest teddy bear at the carnival was a big hit with kids.
meanings.sent4: His rotundest cheeks turned pink from the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The rotundest baby in the family had the sweetest smile.
